entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
